content:
Name: 
Overall Report Grade: 

* Abstract accurately and concisely summarized the work presented?


* Introduction motivated the paper and situated the work in the broader field?


* Methods described the algorithms in enough detail to replicate the work?


* Results presented actual run-time data, either as figure or table?


* Paper presented timing data indicating acceptable time use in large search spaces?


* Discussion attempted to analyze what methods worked well, and why?


* Bibliography/References included more than class material?


* Paper proposed several evaluation heuristics and evaluated what worked and why?


* Overall organization of paper was logical and well thought out?


* Overall scientific and technical merit as a technical paper?


* Other comments:



****
